== Fields

=== `args[]`

A list of arguments to provide the command.

*Type*: `array`

*Default*: `[]`

=== `codec`

The way in which messages should be written to the subprocess.

*Type*: `string`

*Default*: `lines`

*Options*: `lines`

=== `name`

The command to execute as a subprocess.

*Type*: `string`
